properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 11:51AM AKST until January 14 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility will be
reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow
accumulations of up to one inch are expected. Travel will be
difficult.

* WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast.

* WHEN...Midnight tonight to 6 PM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of
blowing and drifting snow. The worst conditions are expected
Tuesday morning.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM AKST TUESDAY
